data.description:
Hidden Fortune is an adventurous treasure hunt through a virtual world of enchantment, with Chapter One: Outcast Cove now free to play! Chapter Two: Shanty Seas is available through single purchase, and unlocks over two hours of new content, including Wands, Orbs, and areas to discover. As a sorcerer on a daring rescue mission, players must use their magic—cast with the Gear VR touchpad or controller—to explore the vivid world around them, and collect peculiar trinkets to aid in their quest. 

Cast Your Magic: Tap the Gear VR or swing the Gear VR Controller to cast magic Orbs, capture trinkets, make charming new acquaintances, and solve tricky puzzles. 

Enter the Wands: These collectable magic devices enable seamless interaction with the virtual world. Orienting intuitively to your hand’s movements, each Wand has unique art and visual effects. 

New Challenges: Each quest in Outcast Cove and Shanty Seas now offers three levels of difficulty to test your wizarding skill.

changelog.change_log:
- The wand is now positioned using the controller position provided by the Oculus SDK
- 2 new environments (Pirate Ship and Pirate Island)
- 8 new Unique game modes (Quests)
- 24 challenges
- 3 gate puzzles and 3 side-quest puzzles
- 10 new secret collectables
- 40 new hidden objects
- 1 new character
- New sfx's
- New wands
- New tutorial
- UI re-designed 
- Up to 2 hours of NEW playable content

- Gold and experience are now tracked separately.
 - 4 new Wands and 4 new Orbs which you can purchase with the gold you collect.
 - Each quest now has 3 challenges to play.
 - The tutorial has been improved.
 - General bugfixes and performance improvements.
 - New SFX's and audio improvements

- ruby and emerald are easier to collect
- voice over from goat wizard stops after you collect the diary entry 
- we now show the entire diary entry at once instead of letter-by-letter
- fixed an issue where breaking a vase with an orb would cause the vase's object to return to the wrong object if tethered and released
- fixed an issue where opening the pause screen while a diary page was open made it impossible to progress

- No longer requests permission to record audio
- Updated store description
- Updated store screenshots
- Revised Magical SFX
- New Voiceovers
- Episode End Cutscene
- Performance optimization
- Misc bug fixes
